channel.title: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start
channel.description:
So I decided to play the mod from the beginning today, and it wouldn't start. I figured maybe something got corrupted, so I reinstalled steam and the whole game and source. I have the mod installed using the installer, and in the default directory recommended. Source SDK base 2007 is also installed.
When I click play game, I can see in task manager that the "hl2.exe" starts up, runs up to about 25mb, then poofs away. I can't figure out what I'm doing wrong. I followed all of the installation instructions.

item.title: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start
item.dc:creator: Crew
item.description:
Yup. Windows 8.1 is the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start

item.title: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start
item.dc:creator: The_2_Inch_Destroyer
item.description:
I have followed everything step by step

I downloaded sdk 2007
I download the files
I extracted the files
I installed Black Mesa
and whenever I run it it just wont load up absolutely nothing
I uninstalled everything and retried but it will not work

I have windows 8.1
could that be it?:’(

Read full topic
item.source: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start

item.title: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start
item.dc:creator: Ethezial
item.description:
There was something wrong with or related to the source base, because it would not even start by itself, it would throw out weird errors whenever I tried to start it up. I ended up reloading my computer from scratch, and whatever was causing the problem is gone now.

Read full topic
item.source: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start

item.title: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start
item.dc:creator: eliotttt25
item.description:
I have the same problem, the game start for 1 sec and crash, And when I run it from sdk base 2007 the two introduction video (valve and source) run then the game crash. It did everything as adviced, four times ! still does not run !

Read full topic
item.source: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start

item.title: Game & SDK 2007 installed, game will not start
item.dc:creator: OrdosAlpha
item.description:
Try running the SDK Base 2007 itself from the Tools menu in Steam first, and quit once you see the main menu. Then, try loading BM.

Read full topic
